name: Ornate Happy Holidays, set of 50 letterpress holiday cards
description:
Set of 50 cards & envelopes, letterpress printed on 100% cotton (tree-free) paper with soy based ink. (photo is not included)

Card size is 4 5/8‚Äù x 6 1/4".
Please select the color you would like below in the drop down below.

Make your purchase and e-mail the name you would like on your stationery, as well as the return address for your envelope, to bdrstudio@gmail.com. After your order has been placed, a PDF proof will be sent to you within 2 business days. Upon approval, please allow 7-10 business days for printing and delivery.

name: Geo Gold, set of 8 letterpress folded note cards
description: Set of 8 folded note cards & envelopes, letterpress printed on 100% cotton (tree-free) paper with soy based ink. Set includes: 2 - stars 2 - circles 2 - diamonds 2 - dots Card size is 3 1/2" x 4 7/8", folded -- perfect for a little note. 40% of the proceeds will benefit the 2010 Susan G. Komen San Diego 3-Day for the Cure on behalf of Marissa Bower. For more information, of if you would like to donate more, please visit the3day.org.
